mainText:
When I heard the news of his death, I was on a ferry in NY, checking Facebook. The news immediately saddened my day. 

I don't know what to say because I'm still in shock.

He is one of few people who can give me excitement. I always look forward to witness his creative and charismatic speech.

He gave me a lot of inspiration.
He taught me the importance of time and having passion.

We lost another genius.
I will miss his all-seeing insight.
I wish I could have seen him.

He is now gone but he will live in my mind forever and continue giving me inspiration and teach me a lot.
header: The deepest condolences to his family and friends.
author: Susumu
